Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.tls.crypto.impl.jcajce

Class JceTlsDHDomain

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.tls.crypto.impl.jcajce.JceTlsDHDomain
All Implemented Interfaces:
TlsDHDomain
public class JceTlsDHDomain extends Object implements TlsDHDomain
JCE support class for Diffie-Hellman key pair generation and key agreement over a specified Diffie-Hellman configuration.
